extendedInfo.description: Ever wanted to learn how to make candy? Now is your chance candy lovers! Join the candylicious cooking fun in your very own Candy Factory.Candy Maker is here! Tie on your apron because we are going to make some real yummy candies and have loads of fun! Guaranteed to be the sweetest and most colorful treat among all your maker apps !A different kind of cooking game for kids. Welcome to your sweetest dream- a universe of yummy candies !!!! A delightfully satisfying experience for all!Enter this amazing Candy Maker app- a story world crammed full of magical fantasy, adventure and real candies. Let your child's imagination run wild with an explosion of color and creativity. Youâll feel like youâre in a Candy Farm. Bonus and enhancements in updates every fortnight! âºâºâºâºâºFEATURESâââââ===============âºBeautiful Backgrounds- Choose from a variety of wallpapers to suit you candy!âºDelightful Fillings- fill in your candy with some tasty cream, dark chocolate, soft caramel, or tangy red sauce!âºEatable Decorations and Wrappers- Decorate it with some sugary eyes, jelly mustaches, biscuit hat, sugar coated sprinkles, candy fruit!âºKids friendly content- A real eye candy for kids-Bring out the creativity in your children! No violence or monsters or zombies or scares.âº Surprise People- Wrap it up in your favorite gift wrap, put up a card and surprise you mom, dad and friends!First mix the ingredients: gum, oil and your favorite flavor. Mix thoroughly the candy ingredients and heat, roll it out using the rolling pin. Then, use the candy cutter to cut out a yummy candy. Finally! itâs time to eat your candyâ¦ munch, munch, munch!!! Or, save it in and show off or eat later! Catch the excitement and flick through the cuteness in this candy munching quest. It is like those memorable childhood visits to the Candy Store. The same gift boxes, colorful candies and sharing with friends.============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES:Â This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.comDISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod.
